new: Share on X: Share your completed focus cycles on X (Twitter) with one click
Release Notes: Stay updated with new features and improvements right from the app
improved: Cleaner and more minimal daily limit notification
Better timer controls and settings interface
Smoother animations and transitions throughout the app
fixed: Improved reliability when switching between devices
Better performance on slower internet connections
Fixed occasional issues with timer starting

new: Custom Vibes: Create your own focus environments with custom music and backgrounds
Leaderboard: See your ranking and compete with other focused users
improved: Faster app loading times across all pages
Enhanced Spotify integration with more playlist recommendations
fixed: Timer now starts reliably on first click
Stats display correctly even with slow connections
